review:
Excellent and very nice medical interaction 
Diagnosis approach is very nice. Very experienced . Very crisp in terms of communication of the diagnosis he did initially and the steps planned next.

I paid a visit to him for extreme pain in left side of my body from waist to feet.I was facing it since childhood and it became acute from past 6months.He investigated my condition for 20mins and identified that it happened due to issues in my Lumber region which was causing problem in my nerves and he diagnosed the whole thing without any pathological test.He only prescribed one medicine and MRI test and the report was at per with his investigation.** ** ** ********* ****** ****** ******I recommend him to everyone who is in need of a good medicine doctor.
The is very very friendly and he is noble person i always pray for him GOD give give him a long life

I took my mother with problems - pain in stomach and lower back. He confidently diagnosed it saying its because her heart is failing. After one month of following his medicines when no relief was observed , I re-visited him and then he came up with diagnosis that because of old age the bones might have become brittle or probably some tumour in spinal cord can cause the pain. 

He advised MRI of cervical spine and LS spine. Nothing was found.  We spent more than 3 months following his medications and investigations, no relief was observed. 
Finally it was Columbia Asia hospital ***** ** *** ********* ** **** **** ****** **** *** ****** ** ******* *** ***** **** ***** ** ******* *** ********* ***** ********* ****** ** * ****** *** *** ** *** ******** ******* 

Please do not visit him.

The entire team of doctors and staff members are highly qualified and efficient towards their duties. We have always received a friendly and warm environment from the hospital management, highly recommended to anyone who is looking for reliable treatment options in the region.
Very hospitable doctor. Everything explained nicely. Staff of the doctor were also very nice and they explained everything.

Asked to pay for a package of 9000rs. to do all sorts of tests. Mentioned that he will only write a prescription after we have done the entire 9000rs. tests and visit him again with the test reports. The consultation charges of Rs. 1750 and also time and energy went to drains.

I visited Dr Saha with high fever and other problems. He recommended me to get hospitalised urgently. For next 6 days He was very careful about my condition as I was detected with a blood infection and diabetis. Now I am back home. Under his supervision on medication. It shows in his attitude that He is very confident and sure of how to treat his paitents. He never made any unnecessary expenses for his paitents.
Everything was perfect except waiting time was abit long even thou you have appointment time confirmed.
doctor Debasis Saha very good human being and very helpful and diagnosis is perfect. I highly recommend dr. debasis Saha.
